name: The Running Van
description:
Entry to Syntaxbombs latest comp. 

You've entered The Running Van gameshow. The longer you last in the arena the more money you make.  Collect the loot, avoid the Stalkers and Hazzards and keep your fuel topped up.

Some features omitted due to deadline will be added post comp. Feedback welcome.

V1.01

Minor bug fixes. Corrected random background  on menu animations, alpha particle artifacts  and some timing issues relating to AI.
